headline: HII’s Ingalls Shipbuilding Hosts Mississippi Educators to Strengthen Workforce Pipelines
summary: PASCAGOULA, Miss., July 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII’s (NYSE: HII) Ingalls Shipbuilding division recently concluded its third annual educator externship, hosting 15 educators from school districts across the Mississippi Gulf Coast. The two-week program, held June 9-20, is part of HII’s broader initiative to strengthen skilled workforce pipelines and align local education efforts with national defense needs. “As we continue to execute on our Navy shipbuilding priorities, investing in workforc

headline: Can C3.ai's New HII Deal Boost Its Defense AI Momentum?
summary: AI expands its defense AI push with HII, scaling a successful pilot to boost U.S. Navy fleet readiness.

headline: HII and Hitachi Lock in Multi-Year REMUS 300 UUV Production Agreement
summary: HII announced the order from Hitachi Ltd. for more than a dozen REMUS 300 small uncrewed undersea vehicles under a program that will deliver the vehicles over multi-years. HII's REMUS 300 platform...

headline: Goldman rolls out latest U.S. Conviction List update
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs has added three new names to its U.S. Conviction List, the investment bank revealed in a note Tuesday.
